name: guy that's waking up and he's just a normal guy who has to work but he can't work because of the aliens!
name_original: guy that's waking up and he's just a normal guy who has to work but he can't work because of the aliens!
description:
"Guy that's waking up and he's just a normal guy who has to work but can't work because of the aliens!" is a short, top-down shooter game about hacking computers and shooting the bad guys! There are currently 4 different weapons to choose from, with more maybe being added later.

Enter your office building and shoot your way through 5 floors. Hack all the computers in a room to open the elevator, and get out of there!
